caption:
This photograph depicts a large pile of wrecked and destroyed vehicles, likely within a junkyard setting. The scene is cluttered with cars that are crushed and stacked haphazardly on top of each other. Many of the cars are old models, judging by their designs, and show significant rust, dents, and other damage, indicating they have been discarded after reaching the end of their usable life. Some vehicles have their hoods ajar or completely removed, exposing the inner mechanical components which are also rusted and broken.

The colors of the cars range from faded reds and blues to whites and rusted metal hues. The composition includes various parts of cars such as doors, bumpers, and engines both intact and in disarray. The clear sky in the background contrasts sharply with the metallic and earthy tones of the piled vehicles, emphasizing the vastness and severity of the waste.

The photograph captures the environmental impact and the scale of waste generated by modern consumerism, particularly in the automotive industry. There are no people or other life forms visible in the image; the scene solely focuses on the aftermath of discarded vehicles piled against a clear, blue sky.
title: Auto dump. (From the Documerica-1 exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 38, 39, 40, 47.)
